content:
Apple Health appears to be able to connect to Athenahealth systems using SMART (or at least OAuth2).

I registered as a developer on the Athenahealth site but I cannot find any documentation about that - the only stuff I found actually says that AthenaHhealth does NOT support OAuth

Is anybody able to shed some light? Maybe someone from Athenahealth in this group could clarify things?
I e-mailed the athenahealth team to point them to your Google Groups post. They've indicated they plan to respond.
